{{Distinguish|MinecraftEdu 0.985}}

This version was released and was known as pre-release has the features of [[MinecraftEdu 0.985|0.985]] in the game was labelled as 0.985.

== Announcement of new features ==
Just to also mention here - latest MinecraftEdu version that allows installation into your own desired folder, includes [[Java Edition 1.3.2]] and many more features can be downloaded from our members area! Pre-release changelog is available here!

Pre-release test version was released 3th October and the latest update was made into the pre-release version 12th of October. Posted by [https://twitter.com/Kulttuuri Kulttuuri] on [https://kulttuuri.tumblr.com/post/33552172491/minecraftedu-0985-pre-release Tumblr].
